deceasedDateTime.short: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not
deceasedDateTime.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because once a patient is marked as deceased, the actions that are appropriate to perform on the patient may be significantly different.

deceasedBoolean.short: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not
deceasedBoolean.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because once a patient is marked as deceased, the actions that are appropriate to perform on the patient may be significantly different.

deceased.short: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not
deceased.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because once a patient is marked as deceased, the actions that are appropriate to perform on the patient may be significantly different.
